text: Bryan Charles Gould (born 11 February 1939) is a New Zealand-born British former politician and diplomat. He was a Member of Parliament (MP) from 1974 to 1979, and again from 1983 to 1994. He was a member of the Labour Party's Shadow Cabinet from 1986 to 1992. He ran unsuccessfully for the leadership of the party in 1992. Gould returned to New Zealand and in 2004 was made a director at TVNZ.About Bryan Gould BryanGould.com ==References== Category:New Zealand politicians Category:UK MPs 1974–1979 Category:UK MPs 1983–1987 Category:UK MPs 1987–1992 Category:UK MPs 1992–1997 Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs
title: Bryan Gould
